title: Requires any renovations of mass transit or rapid transit stations by the MTA shall include facilities to expand access to include persons with disabilities
summary: Requires any renovations of mass transit or rapid transit stations by the MTA shall include elevators, escalators or other facilities to expand access to include persons with disabilities.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          744

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. KELLNER -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN ACT to require the metropolitan transit authority to include accessi-
         bility in mass  transit  and  rapid  transit  stations  whenever  such
         authority makes major capital improvements to such stations

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Notwithstanding any law, administrative code, act, rule  or
    2  regulation  to  the  contrary,  the  metropolitan  transit authority, as
    3  established by section 1263 of the public  authorities  law,  is  hereby
    4  required  to  remove  architectural  and communication barriers that are
    5  structural in nature and to make alterations necessary to ensure  access
    6  by  persons  with  disabilities  in  each existing mass transit or rapid
    7  transit station within that portion of the metropolitan commuter  trans-
    8  portation district, as established by section 1262 of the public author-
    9  ities  law, that is within the boundaries of the city of New York, when-
   10  ever such authority makes alterations to  such  mass  transit  or  rapid
   11  transit  station,  unless such authority can demonstrate that such addi-
   12  tional alterations or removal of such architectural barriers or communi-
   13  cation barriers would result in an undue burden.
   14    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00658-01-1
